name: Leetcode Lite
highlights: Leetcode Clone is a full fledged coding platform with a code editor and a leaderboard
Developed a LeetCode clone using React, Next.js, and Firebase, allowing user account creation and DSA problem-solving.
Overcame challenges in Navbar management for enhanced user navigation and experience.
Implemented a robust system for managing likes and dislikes with transactional operations, addressing data consistency, and resolved hydration errors for accurate dynamic content rendering.

name: Sahayak - Your Satisfaction, Our Priority
technology: React.js, Redux Toolkit, Python, FastAPI, OpenAI Whisper, LLM, Amazon Polly, Chroma DB
highlights: In TOP 60 projects in 2024 Amazon Hackathon
Voice-based customer service application with multilingual support for Amazon.
Automated voice call assistant for more natural user interactions compared to traditional chatbots.
Category-based queries for quick and accurate responses.
Contextual responses with accent adaptation for enhanced user experience.
Sentiment analysis to generate responses based on user's current mood.
Integrated with OpenAI's Whisper for voice-to-text conversion and sentiment analysis.
Text to audio conversion using Amazon Polly for delivering responses in user's preferred language and accent.
Architecture supports efficient handling of queries and responses through various technologies.

name: TK-Commerce App
highlights: E-commerce application built with Flutter, featuring login/registration and shopping functionalities.
Implemented professional app configurations including light and dark themes, helper functions, constants, and utility classes.

Developed comprehensive E-commerce UI/UX with a bottom navigation bar, custom app bar, search widget, scrolling categories, banners with sliders, product grid layout, wishlist, settings, profile, and product details screens.
Integrated cart functionality, checkout process, orders screen, sub-categories, view all products, view all brands, and brand-specific products.
Backend integration with Firebase Authentication for user management, Firestore for data storage, and Cloud Firebase for profile pictures.
Implemented state management for optimizing Firestore reads and writes, category and subcategory fetching, banner redirection, product fetching, sorting, and wishlist management.
Developed functionality for adding/updating addresses, adding products to the cart, and managing the checkout process.

name: Whatsapp Redo
highlights: Whatsapp Redo is a full fledged messaging app with real time chat and group chat
Real-time messaging functionalities, enhancing user engagement within the application using React, Node.js, and Socket.io.
Responsive user interface, with a focus on user experience and accessibility.

name: Blog Application
highlights: Built with MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js for a dynamic and efficient blog platform.
Implemented JWT Authentication for secure user authentication, ensuring encrypted and authenticated access to the blog application.
Incorporated real-time updates for new posts and comments using technologies like WebSockets or Server-Sent Events to keep users engaged and connected.
Ensured a responsive user interface that adapts seamlessly to various devices and screen sizes, enhancing user experience and accessibility.
